name: jennifer rear
text: It was a very nice clean place to eat. Employees were very friendly to us with it being out first time eating there. Pizza was very delicious

name: tillie harrison
text: I have been to numerous locations of blaze across the U.S., but this location is absolutely phenomenal! The customer service is exceptional, you can tell the staff is competent, caring and considerate during this time of crisis. I will definitely be coming back to this location!

name: Adam Howard
text: Fantastic pizza with quality ingredients made to order in just a couple of minutes. The service was good and the restaurant was very clean. We had the simple pie and the green stripe and loved them both. A fantastic value for the amount and quality of food you get. I hope we get one of these in Broken Arrow soon!

name: Randy Braucher
text: It has been 6 months since shut down and they are still not open. Not even for curbside. In addition, the they still show on the delivery services and allows you to go all the way through the order just to be told at the end that “can not …More

name: Joshua Wichers
text: Got the BBQ chicken and meat pizzas along with a few side salads. Pretty pricey, the pizzas were decently priced and they do not charge extra for more toppings, but the salads I felt were high for what you received. The food was pretty good though. Nice atmosphere. Will give it another try sometime.

name: kevin english
text: I liked this place, the pizza was really good, the atmosphere was good, and I really appreciate their commitment to being good global citizens. Psst, I'd tell the line workers to not say that you're the "Subway of pizza" restaurants, brings …More

name: Heidi Lau
text: It has a great aesthetic and friendly staff. They also have vegan options. And since I'm brand new to this new diet I gave it a try. The cheese isn't great but it's edible. The spicy vegan chorizo was very good. Very spicy. And then they have a good array of veggies.

name: Toog Lish
text:
Ordered a red vine + sausage.
For once there wasn't anything negative id say about this pizza. Perfectly cooked, crispy crust, wasnt burnt and delicious. Highly recommended pizza for a low price.

name: bobby clark griswold
text: Absolutely the best pizza in town - so many fresh- healthy ingredients! Not a lot of people realize that this is a super alternative to greasy unhealthy pizza !

name: Cedes Jean
text: Pizza was AMAZING!!!!! But the employees are probably the worst people I’ve experienced, the First girl that greeted us, was rude and vague. She then leaves and another girl starts making our pizza. Not once does she smile, she is …More

name: David Hanson
text:
I LOVE THIS PLACE!!
what's not to like about fresh , real ingredients that you can combine to your personal tastes? And it's quick fired, so you get that little bit of char around the edges of the crust- tasty! Good food at a reasonable price.

name: Charlene Viets
text: Pizza is great. I always do the build your own. Love how I can get vegan. Employees are nice and the place is clean.

name: The One
text: Service is always great but my pizza isn't always cooked as well as other Blaze locations.  Their Blood Orange lemonade is delicious.  If you're vegan be sure to remind them to change their gloves and not to slice your pizza with the same utensils they use for the regular pizzas.

name: Daniel Shaw
text: Amazing... these guys are societies unsung heros.

name: Bradley Lovelace
text: The food is good, but service takes forever during lunch hours; it took about thirty minutes from entering the restaurant to actually get to making my pizza, and about ten minutes after that waiting at the counter to pay. If you're in a hurry, it's best to steer clear.

name: Suzanne Howard
text: Great wood fired pizza. Fresh ingredients and good options. Staff could be nicer but overall a decent lil joint!

name: Crissy S
text: Customer service was great, although I was a bit disappointed on the pizza itself.  The regular crust is not regular, it is super thin, so if you want traditional you definitely want the extra rise.   I also got the keto crust, which was …More

name: Alfredo G
text: Build your own or order off the menu. Your choice of sauce, cheese, meats and veggies, even vegan options. Perfect size for one or two people.

name: CP
text: LeBron wasn't in, but the pizza was exceptional. great customer service. don't get the s'mores pie, not worth it

name: Mandy M
text: Great pizza, fun drinks. Environmentally conscious changes to the way business is done. Good job!

name: Israel H.
text: Build your own pizza with as many toppings as you like good price

name: Nicole Holt
text: We ordered pizza tonight because I've been in and out of doctors appointments all day after taking a fall yesterday. …More

name: Sheena Rogers
text: Apparently management is incapable of staffing properly. Huge lunch rush and there are 3 people working. Very slowly. They are each having to do 2 jobs and it's not working out well.  This is the second time we've come to a Tulsa blaze and they were understaffed and over worked.  We won't be back unless things are fixed.

name: Haley Barnes
text: Me and my family have eaten here a few times and have always liked it. Today however we were served extremely burned food. I didn’t want to make a big deal out of it since I had one of my teenage kids with me and didn’t want to embarrass them but I don’t think I’ll be eating at this location again.

name: B Dunlap
text: Amazing gluten free, vegan pizza around! They have amazing options with quality ingredients...plenty of options for the meat and gluten eaters too!

name: Samuel Jacks
text: By far the worst experience at blaze I have ever had today. Great chain but awful staff. Walked in ordered a simple pizza. First one had a hair in it so I had them re make it. As I waited for the second I downloaded the app for a free …More

name: Heather Muffins
text: I'm giving 5 stars because they have just about the best pizza in town, and I've never had to wait long for an order, and the prices are very reasonable. They did get my order wrong a couple times(out of the few dozen times I've ordered it) but offered a free pie to replace it.

name: Precious Youngblood
text: Shout out to misty!!!! Best worker ever. Had a burnt pizza. Not only did she make the next one perfect she delivered too due to us ordering off postmates originally!!!

name: David Snethen
text: The best pizza I've had since I left Europe, bar none.... (actual quote from my son: "Mom, this pizza is amazing!!") Friendly service, clean store. Great experience!! I love this place!!

name: hit that one switch
text: Friendly environment the food is great I'll be back to eat at this place.

name: Stella Hudson
text: This restaurant has fresh and flavorful ingredients that are healthy. The employees are friendly. And they prepare the food quickly.

name: Craig Banks
text: Delish

name: Michael Almohandis
text: You pick your ingredients  And they make it for you the way you like it Friendly personnel whose excellent  Service

name: Matthew Jennerich
text: Great pizza place with many different options.  Love the specialty soda options and ability to customize the pizzas.  Very quick cooking.

name: Zac Jones
text: Great, friendly staff. Clean dining area. Pizza was good and made exactly to order, and fairly inexpensive, too.

name: Nicholas Berry
text: Similar to subway, the food preparer adds any kind of roping or cheese you want for a personalized experience, no additional charge for extra toppings or cheese. Once prepared they throw it into a wood fire oven to bake and doesn't take …More

name: Jonathan Paugh
text: Great pizza, better service! Since I'd never been here before, I asked my server to make me one of her favorites. She whipped me up something with pineapple and barbecue sauce that was absolutely amazing! …More

name: Brittanie Whitney
text: Serena and Eli we’re fantastic! There was an insane dinner rush and they were the only two working. They were pleasant and were working very hard to keep up with online and in store.

name: Danielle Howarth
text: I love there gluten free crust and vegan cheese options. Staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Rari Lashley
text: Great pizza you can build however you like for one affordable price! They also have vegan and gluten free options

name: Amanda Haight
text: Yesterday was my first time in a Blaze Pizza and I was very impressed. Que and the whole team there were very friendly and welcoming. While my pizza was cooking the staff laughed with me and made my whole experience great. I definitely recommend this place especially this location. Can’t wait to go back!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

name: Melissa Armstrong
text: Pizza made to order fresh in front on you. Great toppings options. Gluten free and vegan options too. Always friendly staff.

name: Cole Henness
text: People were very nice and food was exceptionally good.

name: Jason Rainey
text: Good for their reopening

name: Deidra Davis
text: I’m vegan so finding great pizza is always hard, but this place always has great food.

name: Optimum Performance Garage
text: Good toppings and fair priced. A little bit of a wait.

name: Ryan Caldron
text: First Time eating here and they cook their pies in an old fashioned pizza oven and something about cooking pizza that way always tastes the best to me

name: Georgia Nicole Burr
text: Food was outstanding! The staff on the other hand was so "Rude" We came in 20 minutes before closing ordered 9 pizza's for our company celebration and 2 of the 3 girls working were so disrespectful and rude my sister didn't even order she was almost in tears!

name: Adrienne Baca
text: Delicious pizza! The employee who helped us fully explained how to order since we'd never been here before. Would definitely go back!

name: Jenny Flores24
text: Service sucks.short staffed. Long wait. Simply terrible.

name: Terry Fortner
text: Great pizza and they have a vegan menu witch is great

name: Gens Linton
text: Really enjoyed Blaze Pizza. Staff was great and very helpful in choosing the best variety of pizzas for our large family. Pizza tasted excellent and I look forward to visiting more Blaze Pizzas in my future travels!

name: Peter Hassink
text: Pretty good. They have a gas power brick oven and a Chipotle sort of pick your toppings vibe. I got the impression that they're usually pretty fast, but something got messed up with my order and I didn't get my food for 30 minutes. They were quick to fix it once I told them I was still waiting.

name: Anthony Guida
text: Love Blaze. Vegan cheese is phenomenal.

name: Preston Stanley
text: Took 45 minutes on a mobile order that should have taken 14. Left pizza sitting out. It was ice cold when I got home. Burned the dough nots. Legit never again.

name: Jeff Leinen
text: I loved the pizza, customer service experience, and the entire business model.  Well done!

name: Andre Roberts
text: Great service and the plant based pizza is awesome! 👌🏽

name: Kuty Hooves
text: Pretty good every time I've gone, it's kinda like subway but for pizza. I wouldn't get the Alfredo it doesn't have a ton of flavor, and it makes the crust soggy. Yet, the build your own is great for how cheep it is.

name: Tyler Roberts
text: Slow but good and fresh.

name: Tracy Bean
text: They have keto pizza. It was so good to be able to have pizza again. Taste awesome!

name: Megan McManus
text: I wanted to love Blaze. So cheap. So conveniently located. Order online. Delivery available. Unlimited toppings. But this particular location of Blaze has probably the worst service I've ever received at any restaurant. …More

name: Katie Andrews
text: Food is amazing!!! People are wonderful!! Clean and fun place to just hang out and eat some pizza!

name: mark brawner
text: This is new to us. Wanted a new pizza place. This in heart of the brookside on Peoria,  just north of Charlestons steak. We got the knots WOW if you like cheese..... worth it. Then got the 12 inch SUPER THIN crust. Cooked in a fire brick …More

name: Kyle R
text: I loved the choices and the food was great.

name: chad parkhill
text: So good! Fresh made pizza in brick oven!! Are you kidding me!! What's not to love! Fast friendly tasty this place is where it's at! Don't order pizza from a boring chain, go to blaze Pizza and be amazed!!

name: matt
text: Love this place.  You can get whatever you want on your pizza for under $10 and it's fast and the taste is fantastic!

name: Jedidabs _710
text: High end toppings on delicious crust .. cant be beat

name: Landon Moore
text: Super busy, but the team they had tonight was killin it!!! Eli made the evening by just talking to us for ten seconds in the middle of wiping tables.

name: Sheree Adams
text: Create your own lrg pizza was 💣 great vegan pizza

name: Clark Watson
text: Slow and rude. Took us an hour to get our pizza

name: Newton Simer II
text: You can make your own pie.  Kramer's dream has become a reality.

name: Caleb N
text: Food was great, came out in no time, and the staff were nice.

name: M Gilbert
text: Super super delicious. Their roasted garlic is a religious experience. Paired with the chorizo, it's to die for. When we want pizza, it's our first instinct to order from Blaze.

name: Adam Hawkes
text: Friendly staff, great food, vegan options.

name: Madison Faulkner
text: If they get your order right it's delicious. Unfortunately almost every time we order from them they seem to get our order wrong.

name: Kelly Whitney
text: Tasty, customizable, affordable pizza place, with a very wide variety of toppings to choose from. The line moves a little slow (because everyone likes to customize their order), but it’s worth the wait.

name: Ryan Upton
text: Best pizza in town at a great price. The staff ain’t half bad either. Always friendly and a pleasure to chat with. Thank you for the awesome pizza!!!

name: I B
text: Great customer service. The pizzas are so delicious and of high quality. I'd recommend it to ajanyo who is interested in premium pizzas. I love their art liver signature pizza which has loads of toppings.

name: Libby Banagale
text: BEST gluten free crust I have found.  Several different sauces in any combination you want.  Toppings galore in any amount you want.  I like my pizza a little burned around the edges.  No problem. I have wine with mine, my friend has beer.  Great pizza!

name: Pixie Amy
text: Love this place! Pizza is always good and the options and choices are infinite. The ingredients are always fresh and the employees are very kind! Their Augua fresca and lemonades are very tasty too!

name: Michael Fulton
text: Always has good food. The staff is friendly and helpful as well.

name: Matthew Taff
text: Very good specialty pizza at a great price. The "build your own" option is fantastic.

name: Fuma Asad
text: They were a little short staffed, so we waited for a bit. We also weren't expecting the arugula to be placed on top of the pizza as it was, but with a little adjustment we made due. The Agua Fresca is pretty good too. Not too sweet.

name: Holly Goforth
text: Offers a VARIETY of crust,  pizza toppings, etc. And great staff!

name: Western Doughty
text: The pizza was awful, the employees ignored me when I walked in, it was slow. Seriously, buy local not this half baked concept.

name: Bruce Haley
text: Great food and great atmosphere.  They have a crust made from cauliflower that was excellent.

name: terry holman
text: I went to try the keto pizza because I am on a low carb diet. The pizza was respectable in taste and texture. The keto crust is an extra $4 which is respectable for getting to eat out and have pizza with friends.

name: Neurotic Mystic
text: Great service, welcoming and knowledgable staff. Love the fact they offer vegan and gluten free options without sacrificing flavor and creativity. Definitely a go to place for a guilty pleasure.

name: Waylon Glover
text: This place is amazing. Great value for the price, great food quality and fantastic customer service. Jordan the manager is a great guy. He recognized one of the regulars behind me and they had a great conversation and included me. I can't wait to get back!

name: Edwin Torres
text: Long wait pizza handlers had no gloves on very nasty when told to put gloves on. Only three people that care about customer. Need better management!!!!!

name: Kitzie
text: I love Blaze; a build your own pizza bar for only $8.75?!?! The regular crust is pretty tasty but the gluten free one is also delicious and crispy, then if you like a thicker crust they a "high-rise dough" that is excellent! The location …More

name: Rustian Dunn
text: Pizza was great, only downside to their "fast" pizza service was that we waited in line for 34 minutes before we got to order. there weren't even that many people there. only one person working the line.

name: Daniel Hardesty
text: Love this place! Top notch ingridients and you can design your own pizza or pick one from the menu!

name: Shianne Arguello
text: Super good pizza and friendly staff. Overall great experience.

name: Rachael Delgado
text: Love Blaze Pizza! Fantastic Service at our last visit!

name: Ashley Michele
text: Blaze Pizza is one of my favorite places to eat in Tulsa. Definitely in my top. I'm always super excited when I go to Blaze. The restaurant smells amazing, they have outdoor tables I can take my dog to, and the people working there are the …More

name: Jake Landry
text: The subway of pizza. Excellent pie. Friendly staff

name: MARIA TERESA ARMENTA MIRANDA
text: The place is super clean, the service was great, the price and the quality of food was excellent. Also don’t forget to try the aguas fracas or fresh  limonadas.

name: Swati Nemade
text: Delicious pizza. It's a subway style pizza where you tell them your ingredients for your pizza and fast fire  it. The choices of toppings are good quality and fresh. The staff is friendly and restaurant is clean. Surely go back sometime.

name: muneeb sharieff
text: Great choice of healthy pizza and nice place tho chill with friends!

name: Bre Willard
text: Great food and love they have vegan options, but took a while to order and we were the only ones in line.

name: Angela Ellis
text: Amazing pizza, friendly staff, great prices. Love coming here

name: Jorje Axline
text: Good service, good food. Good GF practices!

name: Michael Flaherty
text: This is my favorite place to go when I get a pizza craving. I recently went vegan and was so happy to discover that this place has my fix should I ever need that itch scratched. The vegan chorizo is great to add to any pizza, whether you're an omvivore or a veghead like me.

name: Lacey Holsey
text: This has become our new favorite place to eat! My kids and I have several food allergies and sensitivities so we don't get to eat out much. We love the gluten, dairy and nut free options, and they always change their gloves without me …More

name: Daniel Tovar
text: Had a pizza here and the employee named Alan really showed great customer service. Walked me through the process and was super professional overall. Give this man a raise! He deserves it! Will definitely come back!

name: Rhonda Soap
text:
They skipped over me and gave my order to someone else
I work on a time schedule this put me behind. Otherwise nice location, nice environment, nice crew. Overall I think it's probably a good place to eat.

name: Grey Town Bullies
text: Great pizza for the price

name: Janice North
text: I love being able to pick my sauces, ingredients and crust.  My favorite pizza place.

name: Taika Pate
text: Amazing pizza!! I love getting to build my own pizza. Friendly staff! I highly recommend.

name: Demetria Gethers
text: Great food and Great customer service😀

name: Amanda S
text: Awesome vegan options, great drink selection, all natural ingredients, and they did away with straws!!

name: ShaDe Brown
text: Great service and pizza

name: Itzy Lopez
text: Great pizza, great staff

name: Patrick Linehan
text: Fast friendly service. Blaze is some of the best pizza you can get for your dollar and the customization options blow other chains out of the water.

name: Isis Clegg-Vinell
text: I love that they have vegan cheese. Makes life easy and cruelty free. Friendly staff.

name: Stirling MacKie
text: This blaze is so amazing!! All of the staff here are so friendly and efficient. They had a slight error with my mom’s pizza so not only did they immediately make her a new one, they personally brought it over to her and gave her a bunch of …More

name: Emily Reeder
text: My first time here was great! Patrick and mike were very helpful showing how everything worked. The pizza was ready quickly and was delicious. Will definitely be back!

name: D Fairley
text: One of my favorite spots

name: Peter Ehlers
text: Great pizza, fast service, and a friendly staff make this place worth a trip. The menu is simple and the pricing is by pizza not by topping choice, so you can come up with various wacky combinations or try one of their favorites. Pies are …More

name: Mary Hendricks
text: Love the arugula salad with fruit & goat cheese!!! I get the Green Stripe with no meat and pile on veggies & cheese. Vegan cheese is available. Gluten-free crust too.

name: Taylor Maddox
text: Blaze pizza is awesome! The staff is friendly and the pizza is amazing!

name: Christopher Fuka
text: Great concept. It is a little pricey but you get exactly the pizza you want, and the ingredients are top notch in quality.

name: Ann Cughan
text: Friendly fast service. Great pizza made to my liking. Have been back several times. The service is outstanding every time I go. The dough boy his name is Tim always makes my dough to my liking. Jorden and Patrick is always friendly and …More

name: Tricia
text: Amazing food and a great experience. I have visited over 15 times and only 1 experience wasn’t less than perfect. …More

name: Kristine Weaver
text: Awesome place to eat. Great prices too. One seater bathroom doesn't cut it though. But all in all, it was a fun experience. 👍👍

name: A W
text: If you like thin crust pizza that doesn't have a cardboard textured bottom this is the place for you. Fantastic value for the build your own pizza - thoroughly enjoyed the pesto drizzle. Modern atmosphere and fast service.

name: Prince El
text: I've been here 4 or 5 times and no exaggeration EVERY TIME they forget about me and I have to remind them to start cooking my food! Like SERIOUSLY.. 4 of the times I've even called ahead and they'll just sit the pizza out and not even tell …More

name: Thomas Black
text: Delicious pizza. All extra toppings free. Reasonable price. This will definitely be in the regular rotation.

name: thomas patterson
text: So this one is difficult.  The pizza is good... Eventually.  Every time I have been in here too "give it another shot" I end up waiting a really long time before the staff even notices me.  Most recently, The guy who is supposed to greet …More

name: Chris Bougher
text: Out of my frustration with my first visit, and after reading other poor reviews, I find it neccneces to leave one of my own. In short form, their wait is EXTREMELY terribly because the staff is VERY inefficient. I placed an order 45 minutes …More

name: Caleb Bates
text: Love the food, always friendly service. Manager on duty was awesome, but specifically want to call out Alan- every time we go in he's always on his A game: courteous, friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. We go here multiple times a week and always enjoy our experience!

name: Tulsa American CBD
text: Great keto crust pizza

name: Matt Morgan
text: This place has a great variety of Pizza types and toppings. Incredible staff and great people always! Thanks for another great experience today! Love you guys and your great food!

name: Baron Cage
text: Love the special details they do! Always a great meal when we go!

name: Prkr Mstrsn
text: Great prices! great topping. Delicious crust! I'm a frequent blazer

name: Arvilla Mathews
text: They make my pizza how I want and mom can have her vegan pizza. We eat what we want.  And Nathan is a great manager!

name: Joseph Staton
text: All I can say is I can't believe I've never tried this pizza before. It was some of the best I've ever had, and the service was great! Staff is super friendly and I got my pizza pretty darn fast! Definitely going here again.

name: Teresa Gibson
text: Very good food friendly people

name: Nicole Ellison
text: Best pizza in Tulsa! Awesome employees Dejuan is the GOAT!

name: heather thomas
text: Ordered through postmates- pizza cold as all heck and order wrong! Receipt on box says correct order and ingredients and pizza was still wrong so I have to order again and wait for a refund for my first order. So I have to spend the money …More

name: BRETT Jeffries
text: The pizza is good. Even bad pizza is good pizza, right? Patrick, the manic pixie assistant manager, took care of us. We watched him bounce from table to table, spreading the love and hope that tomorrow might be a better day. …More

name: Rebeka sue Shultz
text: Excellent as always reasonable priced and the pizza is always hot and yummy in are tummy 😋 😍 love love love and all together great atmosphere

name: Leanne Wright
text: You can build your own pizza!!

name: Smart Claw
text: Pretty amazing pizzas! Although they forgot one the pizzas and took a long time to start making it

name: T Johnson
text: Good pizza, the only thing is I wish they would cook the pizza longer, I do not like soggy pizza.  I always have to take the rest home after 1 slice and out it in the oven. DON'T RUSH YUMMY GOODNESS Other than that it's A-OKAY!

name: Lyndon Giles
text: Parking sucks. Otherwise quick and responsive to orders. And made in front of you while you wait.

name: DiplexSky91550 Jenkins
text: Some of the best pizza i will ever have

name: M Chan
text: It's one of these fast casual places where you gotta walk em through the whole process like you're at Subway or something.  I guess if the pizza sucks that's supposed to be my fault?  It's okay I guess, but I'd rather just order a pizza off the menu.

name: Brad Brugger
text: Great pizza, service was a little as they opened. Ended up being worth the wait.

name: Scott Bartlett
text:
This was my 3rd time coming to this Blaze location. The first time we came the pizza and service were both good.
The 2nd time the service was completely absent.  I was getting a massive amount …More

name: Cameron Johnson
text: Delicious pizza, decent pricing for the size snd style of pizza. Dining in was a pleasant experience for the entire family, the drink choices were not ordinary but all excellent. I'm interested to try another style and impressed so I will …More

name: lil bass
text: My Family, I  had a Great time , loved  it Great Pizza,  Service  Happy to Come  Back Amanda Betts 😇

name: L Canino
text: Best pizza always.

name: Mandy Coffey
text: This place has tasty pizza and a good atmosphere and great help

name: B Redding
text: This is by far my favorite pizza! The staff at this location is incredibly nice. They’re always so friendly and work quick to prepare my pizza! Really good management!

name: Ryan Kime
text: Great location and the staff made a recommendation that made the pizza even better!

name: Raymond Anderson
text: 5 stars because this place delivers tasty pizza quick. Well, the 5th star is because they also sell beer. I read a lot of reviews about this place. A guy complained about a 10 minute wait. So, who do you believe?  Me? I'm telling you the …More

name: Ceyeli Corbett
text: Everyone is so friendly and helpful! We love the atmosphere. Roach was so awesome to explain to us the best way to order if someone was gluten sensitive! Great food and people!

name: Tillisha Reilly
text: Great pizza, great atmosphere, excellent customer service. And Tee, Que, and Allen are super friendly! Made my visit worth all the while. We will definitely be going back!!

name: Patrick
text: As with any Blaze Pizza, typical pizza with good prices and great customer service.  The staff take interest in who is in there! Don't pass on the doughknots, that IS something to write home about!

name: Scooby Tulsa
text: It was tasty. Just not anything extraordinary. Any other pizza works the same for me. Want a phenomenal pie? Try Marios on 51st and Harvard!

name: Dillan Long
text: Yo this place is absolutely amazing! I just went in for my first time. And right off the get go these guys had great customer service. They walked my vegan first timing ass all the way through the process and GOD the pizza was so goooood! …More

name: Jordan Bates
text: The manager Jordan was awesome! Best service and town and fast enough to eat on a tight lunch schedule!! Can't recommend enough!

name: Bryce Wakefield
text: Not impressed. The Subway of pizza joints. Terrible service. Watched a staff member on hands and knees picking up trash, throw said trash away, then handle ingredients. No hands washed. Pizza was mediocre.

name: Nora Zoller
text: The staff was fun and attentive. We had several of them come to our table and make sure we didn't need anything and Melinda even offered to get us refills on our drinks. Great atmosphere and delicious food. AWESOME place will definitely bring the family back.

name: Isabella Ortega
text: I love this place! It's like a quiznos for pizza.  I really love the variety of toppings you can add and you get to watch it cook in a brick oven. The crust can be pretty messy but the taste of the pizza makes it all worth it.  They should give out wet wipes lol.

name: Krystal Bailey
text: Absolutely Love It! Que makes them the best for me every time! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! She makes the experience great every time! 👍🏾👍🏾

name: Azoth Grayson
text: It's not all too bad really. I just think you can get stuff better or just as good at a better deal someplace else

name: Bob Brandt
text: Slow service. Too much extra toppings slopped around the prep area. Uniforms dirty. Name tags missing. When I got my pizza it had voids and excessive burn areas in the crust.

name: Playler
text: The pizza is always awesome , the price is decent and one pizza is probably enough to share between 2 kids , they also have some pretty unique soda flavors and tasty blood orange lemonade .

name: Dhanush C Manjunatha
text: Blaze pizza is the best pizza. Unlimited fresh and healthy toppings. One of the best wood fire pizzas I have had.

name: derpstin frost
text: Great vibes, awesome staff, and even better pizza! All of the employees have such welcoming and helpful attitudes. Shout-out the night crew. :-)

name: 3crazies andaLady
text: Great place, under new management! Friendly service and great food 😋😋😋😋

name: Alejandra Galaz
text: The pizza was delicious! It was not too thick and not too thin. The overall process was great and so was the service, definitely going back again

name: Elise Thompson
text: My 2nd time to visit was on National Pie Day, and I was so impressed! The line was crazy long, but the staff was so friendly!  They made sure the place stayed clean, everyone had a smile on their face and the manager was going around …More

name: Kevin Pofahl
text: Friendly staff and great pizza.

name: Mr Johnson
text: They have amazing pizza

name: Shane Berrett
text: We ate here on a cold, rainy night so it wasn't busy at all. Our pizzas were wonderful, the staff was on point, and the atmosphere was solid. Definitely returning in the future.

name: Nate Grim
text: Clean, well staffed, efficient processes. Quality ingredients at reasonable prices. Would recommend.

name: Julia murphy
